span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 熄灭： to put out (a fire, for example); quench
【例】 the fire in the skillet煮锅 was quickly extinguished by slamming砰击 the lid盖子 on
【近】 blanket, douse, quench, put out, snuff out
【反】 ignite, rekindle 点燃
【考法 2】 v. 终止： to bring to a complete end the physical soundness, existence, or usefulness of
【例】 a fatal blunder that extinguished all hope that the team would actually win the play-offs
【近】 annihilate, decimate, demolish, desolate, devastate, pulverize, ruin, shatter, smash, tear down, pull down, rub out
【反】 build, construct, erect, raise, rear, set up, put up 建立
【记】 ex 出 + stingu，近于stick 将(燃烧的)木棍，木头，取出来，没木头了火就灭了
【另】 distinguish(把木头挑出来)区别, 辨别, distinguished 卓著的, 著名的,extinguish(木头取出) 熄灭,消灭
